00002 !  ===============================================================
00003 !
00004 !                          EARTH_PLATE 
00005 !
00006 !    Emulate grounded earth plate at z=0 
00007 !
00008 !  ===============================================================
00009 
00010 subroutine earth_plate
00011 
00012   use physvars
00013   use treevars
00014   use utils
00015   implicit none
00016 
00017   integer :: i,p
00018   integer, save :: iseed1=5
00019   integer, save :: iseed2=7
00020   real :: gamma, hx, hy, hz, phi, delta_r
00021   real :: x_limit, y_limit, z_limit, r_limit, xt, yt, zt, xt2, yt2
00022 
00023   do p=1,npp
00024      xt = x(p) - plasma_centre(1)  ! shift origin to 1st target centre
00025      yt = y(p) - plasma_centre(2)
00026      zt = z(p) - plasma_centre(3)
00027 
00028      xt2 = xt - displace(1)
00029      yt2 = yt - displace(2)
00030 
00031      r_limit = r_sphere
00032      x_limit = x_plasma/2.
00033      y_limit = y_plasma/2.
00034 
00035      if (target_geometry==1) then
00036         ! sphere
00037         !             constrained = (xt**2 + yt**2 + zt**2 <= r_limit**2) 
00038 
00039 
00040      else if (target_geometry==2) then
00041 
00042      else if (target_geometry==3) then
00043         ! wire
00044 
00045         if ( q(p)>0 .and. zt < -x_limit ) then
00046  ! Reflect ions that hit earth plate
00047            z(p) = z(p) + 2*(-x_limit - zt)
00048            uz(p) = -uz(p)
00049 
00050         else if ( q(p)<0 .and. zt <  -x_limit ) then 
00051 
00052  ! Absorb electrons and reinject with thermal velocity
00053            call reinject(vte,1,ux(p),uy(p),uz(p))
00054 !write(*,*) 'new velocities:', ux(p),uy(p),uz(p)
00055            z(p)= plasma_centre(3) -x_plasma/2 + uz(p)*dt/2. 
00056 
00057            if (pelabel(p) <= npart/2 .and. xt**2+yt**2 > r_sphere**2) then
00058  ! Wire 1 electrons falling outside wire1 get reinjected inside wire1
00059              do while (xt**2+yt**2 > r_sphere**2)
00060                 xt = r_sphere*(2*rano(iseed2)-1.)
00061                 yt = r_sphere*(2*rano(iseed1)-1.)
00062              end do
00063 
00064              y(p) = yt + plasma_centre(2)
00065              x(p) = xt + plasma_centre(1)
00066 
00067            else if (pelabel(p) <= npart/2 .and. xt**2+yt**2 <= r_sphere**2) then
00068   ! Wire 1 electrons falling inside get put back in  wire 2
00069              y(p) = y(p) + displace(2)
00070              x(p) = x(p) + displace(1)
00071 !             pelabel(p) = pelabel(p) + npart/2  ! Relabel as wire2 electron
00072 ! write(*,*) 'wire 1 reflect:',x(p),y(p),z(p),ux(p),uy(p),uz(p),pelabel(p)
00073  
00074            else if (pelabel(p) > npart/2 .and. xt2**2+yt2**2 > r_sphere**2) then
00075  ! Wire 2 electrons falling outside wire2 get reinjected inside wire2
00076              do while (xt2**2+yt2**2 > r_sphere**2)
00077                 xt2 = r_sphere*(2*rano(iseed2)-1.)
00078                 yt2 = r_sphere*(2*rano(iseed1)-1.)
00079              end do
00080              y(p) = yt2 + plasma_centre(2)+displace(2)
00081              x(p) = xt2 + plasma_centre(1)+displace(1)
00082 
00083            else if (pelabel(p) > npart/2 .and. xt2**2+yt2**2 <= r_sphere**2) then
00084   ! Wire 2 electrons falling inside get put back in  wire 1
00085              y(p) = y(p) - displace(2)
00086              x(p) = x(p) - displace(1)
00087  !            pelabel(p) = pelabel(p) - npart/2  ! Relabel as wire1 electron
00088  ! write(*,*) 'wire 2 reflect:',x(p),y(p),z(p),ux(p),uy(p),uz(p),pelabel(p)
00089            endif
00090 
00091         endif
00092 
00093 
00094      else
00095  
00096     endif
00097  
00098 end do
00099 
00100 end subroutine earth_plate
